content:
We're getting the exception below, just for the Parameters resource. As far as I can tell there is no parameters.sch file for any version of FHIR in the HAPI sources.

ca.uhn.fhir.rest.server.exceptions.InternalErrorException: Failed to load schematron for resource 'Parameters'. Note that as of HAPI FHIR 1.2, DSTU2 validation files are kept in a separate JAR (hapi-fhir-validation-resources-XXX.jar) which must be added to your classpath. See the HAPI FHIR download page for more information.
    at ca.uhn.fhir.validation.schematron.SchematronBaseValidator.getSchematronAndCache(SchematronBaseValidator.java:134)
    at ca.uhn.fhir.validation.schematron.SchematronBaseValidator.getSchematron(SchematronBaseValidator.java:119)
    at ca.uhn.fhir.validation.schematron.SchematronBaseValidator.validateResource(SchematronBaseValidator.java:70)
    at ca.uhn.fhir.validation.schematron.SchematronBaseValidator.validateResource(SchematronBaseValidator.java:66)
    at ca.uhn.fhir.validation.FhirValidator.validateWithResult(FhirValidator.java:213)
